title: Fps drops
body: I have an extremely old pc and i've been able to play league quite efficiently with about 40 frames per second but since about April 2016 I have not been able to play the game with more than 18 or 19 frames and it is just not fun so is there any patches coming up or anything to increase performance or make the game easier to run? I have always played with the lowest visual settings and I have been testing the different revolutions and nothing appears to work

replies.body:
Keep in mind that League is a constantly evolving game.  With every patch, there may be things added that provide additional resource drain on your computer.  We strive to keep the game playable for even low-end machines, but it is possible you may hit a point where you simply need to upgrade to run the game at a consistent FPS level.  

In the meantime however, I strongly recommend completing the steps in our[ FPS Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684).  The steps there are some of the most common solutions to make sure that your FPS is as high and stable as possible.

Feel free to give me a heads up if you're still experiencing any issues!
